scripts.say: How did you get here, Javelin?
We were on our way back from a commission when suddenly this fog appeared out of nowhere, and suddenly we found ourselves inside a Mirror Sea...
Were there any others in your fleet?
Yeah, there were. Ayanami, Laffey, and Z23 were with me.
We'd better go looking for them then...
Fubuki! Mio! I'm so relieved to see you're okay!
Likewiiiise. I don't know what I would've pooooossibly done if you'd gotten huuuurt. God forbiiiid.
Let me introduce you to my new friend: Javelin!
Are you a Hololive character too?
Yup. I'm Hololive's pure and innocent highschool girl â€“ Natsuiro Matsuri!
And you're Kawakaze, aren't you? I've heard about you before! Listen, I've got a bucket list to check off, so would you mind if I stroked your tail? And could I get a hug? Can we go on a date after?
... If you're from the same place as this Shirakami Fubuki, where did you get your rigging from?
Oh, you mean my shooty bang bang stuff? I got it from Purity!
She's this nice girl in spats who rescued me and Aqua when we were in trouble. She even made us some gear to defend ourselves with!
Purity... A girl in spats... Wait, it can't be...
You know what "can't be"? How pretty she is! You should see her!
She and Aqua stayed behind at the Resistance base to strengthen its defenses while Javelin and I went out to look for people.
Matsuri's mostly right, but there's a bit more to it... We should probably go back to the base for now.
